snippet.title: Warden's Will — Good Luck... You're Gonna Need it — Animated Trailer
snippet.description:
Warden’s Will is a third-person movement shooter with bullet hell combat and roguelite progression, playable in single-player or up to 3 players co-op.

Play as one of the Wardens, pick a fun weapon, create unique builds and destroy some evil robots to save the galaxy! 👾 👾 👾

Play the demo now and wishlist Warden's Will on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1689640/Wardens_Will/

This Kickass 2D Animated Trailer was made internally by the Elyzio Team:

Animator and Director
Damian Ciancio

Music and Sound Design
Allan Pluger 
https://www.instagram.com/allanpluger/

Creative Director
Ziya Göncü

Producer
Yasin madyb Ilgün

Project Supervisors 
Dogan Can Yeginer
Anas El Ferachi

Clean-up and Additional Help
Alejo Marotta
Emily Edge
DAYNE

Social Links for Warden's Will
🔴 X (Twitter) -  https://twitter.com/WardensWillGame
🔴 TikTok -  https://www.tiktok.com/@wardenswillgame
🔴 Insta - https://www.instagram.com/wardenswillgame/

Join the community on Discord - https://discord.gg/MWDjeAqQws
